title: Exploring New Educational Cultures for Innovating Science Education Based on Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Experimental approach applying theological education theories to scientific fields and implementing blended learning in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three collaborative strategies for scientific problem-solving in blended learning environments.
Learners can improve their understanding of scientific concepts by over 80% by integrating digital platforms with face-to-face sessions.
Learners can perform at least two analyses of science ethics case studies applying theological thinking using online discussion tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
